title: Child hospitalized after shooting self in hand
content:
INDIANAPOLIS (WISH) – Indianapolis Metropolitan Police Department confirmed that a child shot himself in the hand on the city’s north east side Monday afternoon.
IMPD responded to the 9000 block of East 39th Place just after 3 p.m. for a child who was shot in the hand. Police say it was self-inflicted.
The child was taken to Riley Hospital for Children at IU Health for treatment. The extent of the child’s injuries was unclear.
Check back at WISHTV.com for more details as they develop.
